thread.title: Jamie Thomas Sharpe
thread.title_full: DogVacay reviewed by Jamie Thomas Sharpe

author: Jamie Thomas Sharpe
title: Jamie Thomas Sharpe
text: We were looking for a safe and loving way to board our dogs when we travel and DogVacay helped us get connected to a wonderful woman who took great care of our dogs in her home. Their process was very quick and gave a secure way for us to evaluate each other and to pay securely as well. We received prompt replies, excellent updates on our dogs while we were gone. I would highly recommend this service and will definitely use them again.
